text: Tucker Lepley (born January 17, 2002) is an American professional soccer player who plays for Swope Park Rangers in the USL Championship via the Sporting Kansas City Academy. ==Career== Lepley played with USL Championship side Swope Park Rangers during their 2019 season from Sporting Kansas City's academy. He made his first professional appearance on July 20, 2019, as an 83rd-minute substitute during a 4-0 loss to Ottawa Fury. ==References== == External links == * Sporting KC profile * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Soccer players from North Carolina Category:Sporting Kansas City II players Category:Sportspeople from Charlotte, North Carolina Category:USL Championship players
title: Tucker Lepley
